title: Feeling Lucky?
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B076ZRZ8PXSteve and crew continue riding the wave of vengeance towards the West Coast and the Korean strongholds. Join them while they fight their way through the city of sin, rescue damsels in distress and continue the search for something to tame Daisy's breath. They reunite with old comrades to recover a weapon that may finally give them the vengeance they seek.
author: R.S. Merritt
